# Postcard Raytracers

## Comparison
| Version          | #1 | #2 | #3 |
|------------------|----|----|----|
| Prop Colors      |❌|✔️|✔️|
| Sky Gradient     |❌|✔️|✔️|
| Shading          |Phong|Phong|Phong|
| Prop Reflections |❌|✔️|✔️|
| Error Free*      |✔️|✔️|❌|
| Characters       |627|628|590|

\* _This means that the chip will intentionally throw errors or have weird behavior to conserve space._
